summary: Provides classes that read and write GEOS geometry objects to and from Well‑Known Binary (WKB) and Well‑Known Text (WKT) formats, enabling conversion between in‑memory spatial objects and their standard serialized representations.
business_intent: Supports Django GIS applications in persisting, exchanging, and interoperating spatial data by handling serialization and deserialization of geometry objects across common GIS data formats.
